annotations.description: The Archangel was created by Michael McIlroy and Richard Boccato at the bar Milk & Honey around 2006. This cocktail is a play on a Pink Gin (Angostura Bitter...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Archangel

textContent:
2.25oz (67ml) Gin
.75oz (20ml) Aperol
2 Cucumber Slices

Muddle cucumber in mixing glass. 
Add ingredients and ice. Stir. 
Double strain into cocktail glass. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=znhzzDZ13QQ&t=1s
title: Archangel
